details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.13 Implementation limits - Integer
details.description: A conforming file shall not contain any integer greater than 2147483647. A conforming file shall not contain any integer less than -2147483648.

rule.description: A conforming file shall not contain any integer greater than 2147483647. A conforming file shall not contain any integer less than -2147483648.
